nodes.name: Project Governance
nodes.description: Processes and roles that define how decisions are made in the project.

nodes.name: Leadership Structure
nodes.description: Defines who leads and how leadership changes.

nodes.name: Decision-Making Process
nodes.description: How key decisions are made, including voting or consensus mechanisms.

nodes.name: Voting Mechanisms
nodes.description: Whether decisions are made by majority vote, consensus, etc.

nodes.name: Decision Transparency
nodes.description: Availability of decision rationales and public logs.

nodes.name: Governance Participation Rate
nodes.description: The percentage of eligible members participating in votes.

nodes.name: Average Decision Time
nodes.description: Average time taken to reach a decision from proposal to resolution.

nodes.name: Community Engagement
nodes.description: How contributors, users, and stakeholders engage with the project.

nodes.name: Contributor Onboarding
nodes.description: How new contributors are introduced to the project and its processes.

nodes.name: Contributor Guide
nodes.description: Whether a contributor guide exists and how comprehensive it is.

nodes.name: Mentorship Program
nodes.description: Structured pairing of newcomers with experienced contributors.

nodes.name: New Contributor Retention Rate
nodes.description: Percentage of new contributors who remain active after 3 months.

nodes.name: Contributor Guide Access Rate
nodes.description: Frequency with which the contributor guide is accessed.

nodes.name: Project Sustainability
nodes.description: Long-term viability including funding, resources, and project health.

nodes.name: Financial Health
nodes.description: Resources available to support ongoing development.

nodes.name: Funding Sources
nodes.description: Where the money comes from: sponsors, grants, donations.

nodes.name: Dependency on Grant Funding
nodes.description: Extent to which project relies on grants for survival.

nodes.name: Sponsor Engagement
nodes.description: How sponsors are acquired, retained, and acknowledged.

nodes.name: Annual Funding Amount
nodes.description: Total financial contributions received annually.

nodes.name: Number of Active Sponsors
nodes.description: Number of sponsors contributing financially in the current year.

nodes.name: Interoperability
nodes.description: The ability of the project to integrate and function across systems.

nodes.name: Standards and Protocols
nodes.description: Use of and alignment with open standards and interfaces.

nodes.name: API Design
nodes.description: How well the APIs are designed for external consumption.

nodes.name: API Documentation Quality
nodes.description: Clarity and completeness of API documentation.

nodes.name: API Versioning Strategy
nodes.description: How API changes are managed and communicated.

nodes.name: External API Usage Count
nodes.description: Number of external integrations using the API.

nodes.name: Backward Compatibility Breaks
nodes.description: Number of times backwards compatibility is broken in major releases.

nodes.name: User and Market Adoption
nodes.description: How the project is used and adopted in practice.

nodes.name: Community and Market Reach
nodes.description: Extent and diversity of the project's usage and audience.

nodes.name: Internationalization and Localization
nodes.description: Support for non-English languages and local deployment contexts.

nodes.name: Language Support Breadth
nodes.description: How many languages the project supports.

nodes.name: Translated Documentation Availability
nodes.description: Availability of documentation in non-English languages.

nodes.name: Number of Supported Locales
nodes.description: Count of fully supported languages/locales.

nodes.name: Percentage of Docs Translated
nodes.description: Percent of documentation that has been translated.
